title: PowerISO v6.0 Incl Patch-Ru.Board [TorDigger]
description:
PowerISO

PowerISO - utility for processing and file compression tool, allows you to create, extract, compress, edit and convert image files ISO / BIN, and mount these files with internal virtual drive. Most importantly - files can be used directly without decompressing. There is support for almost all image file formats CD / DVD (ISO, BIN, NRG, DAA and so on .. 

Create, edit, extract, convert, compress, encrypt, mount CD image file!!! PowerISO is a powerful image processing and file compression tool, which allows you to create, extract, compress, edit and convert ISO / BIN image files, and mount these files with internal virtual drive. And most of all, the compressed files can be used directly without decompressing. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support ISO, BIN, NRG, IMG, DAA, ... 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Open, Create, Edit, Extract ISO File ... 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Compress, Encrypt, Split ISO File ... 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Integrated with internal Virtual Drive ... 

Main Features:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support almost all CD / DVD-ROM image file formats (ISO, BIN, NRG, IMG, DAA and so on). 
Note: DAA (Direct-Access-Archive) is an advanced format for image file, which supports some advanced features, such as compression, password protection, and splitting to multiple volumes. It can be handled directly just like other formats, such as ISO, BIN, ... 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports on-the-fly burning. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports UDF image file. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create image file from hard disk files or CD / DVD-ROM. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Edit an existing image file. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Can edit and burn Audio CD image file. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Extract files and folders from image file. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Convert image files between ISO / BIN and other formats. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make bootable image file, get boot information from bootable image file. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make floppy disk image file. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Optimize files to save disk space while saving image files. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Mount image file with internal virtual drive. Even if the image file is saved as DAA format, the virtual drive can handle that format directly. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support shell integration, such as context menu, Drag and Drop, clipboard ... 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports command-line parameters. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Can open XBOX image file. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports multiple languages 

PowerISO 6.0 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support BDXL burning. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support pause and resume when writing or extracting image file. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Some minor bug fixes and enhancements. 

Supported OS:

Windows 98, Me, 2000, XP, 2003, Vista, Windows 2008, Windows 7, Windows 8 

Homepage: http://www.poweriso.com
